select a.*, g.goal_id as g_goal_id, g.parent_id as g_parent_id, g.member_serial_number as g_member_serial_number, g.title as g_title, g.kind as g_kind, g.start_datetime as g_start_datetime, g.end_datetime as g_end_datetime, g.progress_rate as g_progress_rate, g.color as g_color, g.create_datetime as g_create_datetime, g.modification_datetime as g_modification_datetime from activity a left outer join goal g on a.goal_id = g.goal_id
